title: Geographic Coverage Areas
description: The geographic locations where the data refer or are related.
usageNotes: Geographic locations are drawn from the GeoNames geographical database. Source: https://www.geonames.org/

city.title: City
city.description: A town, city, or similar political entity covered in a data collection

county.title: County
county.description: A county or similar administrative area covered in a data collection

state.title: State
state.description: A state, province, canton or similar political entity covered in a data collection

country.title: Country
country.description: A country covered in a data collection

uri.title: Geographic Coverage Area URI
uri.description: The unique identifier for the geographic coverage area.

usageNotes: In addition to the total geographic scope of the data, may include any additional levels of geographic coding provided in the variables.
